question: What is the theme of 2017 International Women's Day (IWD)?
option2: Equality for Women is Progress for All
option3: Planet 50-50 by 2030: Step It Up for Gender Equality
option4: Women in the Changing World of Work: Planet 50-50 by 2030
answer: Women in the Changing World of Work: Planet 50-50 by 2030
explanation: The International Women\'s Day (IWD) is observed every year on March 8 to commemorate the struggle for women\'s rights and to highlight the achievements of women while calling for greater equality. The 2017 theme of IWD is “Women in the Changing World of Work: Planet 50-50 by 2030” and its’ campaign theme is “#BeBoldForChange”.
